entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning then light early this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
